title: Jaakko Keso: Tämä on Amerikka
overview: Journalist Jaakko Keso has arrived in America! He plans to find out how messed up the United States and its people really are. Some citizens believe that the country is so deep in the swamp that the idea of a bloody civil war is not out of the question. On his research journey, Jaakko and his friend Brandon encounter incredible characters, embarrassing situations, dangerous places and endless laughter.
